University, Alabama
May 29, 19$3
Dr* Burton Paulu
KUOM, University of Minnesota
Kinneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Bur tom
Thank you for the copies of correspondence between Hr# E« M#
Hutchinson, Secretary, National Institute of Adult Education, in London,
and Mr# C* Scott Fletcher#
According to ray present plane I sh&Ll be in London from July 8
to l£ and certainly should have time for a conference with Hr. Hutchinson
on the subject he raised* Should you and Mr# Fletcher deem it worthwhile,
I woulo suggest that you write Mr* lutchineon indicating the dates of ray
visit and ray interest in talking to him* In the event no final determina¬
tion is made of the proposal before that time, you could continue the
discussions when you go to England#
My kindest regards always*
Sincerely yours.
Gr&ydon Ausraus
President
GAspse
ccs C* Scott Fletcher
